text.tspan: (1) if helpful, then RL is rewarded
(2) if RL predict latent state, also reward
Rule tail = linear composition of values
= tokens (can be interpreted as logic propositions)
= original LLM (Transformer) architecture. Yellow strip = middle hidden
layer, where the most abstract representation is supposed to emerge.
= middle layer of LLM = "state" of RL, made of a horizontal row of tokens.
= input sentence. LLM is like Helen Keller, reading a single word each
time. At time step t+1, Transformer generates a vertical column of tokens,
that includes the prediction of the next word.
